0.title: Antioxidant makeup remover wipes
0.description:
Dafi's antioxidant-type make-up remover wipes, with effective and useful ingredients, removes make-up, impurities and pollution from the entire face and give your face a special vitality and freshness by soothing, hydrating, repairing and nourishing the skin.

  • Provides skin moisture and protects the outer layer of the skin against harmful factors.
  • Contains coenzyme ketone to rejuvenate and slow down the aging process of facial skin
  • Enriched with antioxidants, containing extracts of cucumber, chamomile, lemon, marigold and aloe vera.
  • Quantity: 55 sheets

1.title: BRIGHT BEAUTY makeup remover wipes
1.description:
Dafi brightening type make-up remover wipes with effective and useful ingredients, removes make-up, impurities and pollution from the entire face and gives your face a special vitality and freshness by soothing, hydrating, repairing and nourishing the skin.

  • Clarifying and lightening the skin, along with maintaining the elasticity of the facial skin
  • Fast removal of fat, cosmetics from facial skin without causing sensitivity
  • Contains skin-friendly ingredients such as cucumber, chamomile, lemon, aloe vera, marigold and
  • Prunus serrulata (Japanese cherry) extracts.
  • Quantity: 55 sheets

2.title: Micellar makeup remover wipes
2.description:
Dafi micellar make-up remover wipes, with effective and useful ingredients, remove make-up, impurity and pollution from the entire face and give your face a special vitality and freshness by soothing, hydrating, repairing and nourishing the skin.

  • Contains micellar water makeup remover
  • Softening and moisturizing the skin, preventing dryness and roughness after cleansing the face
  • Increasing skin elasticity and protecting skin against free radicals
  • Contains cucumber, chamomile, fig, lemon, spring flower, aloe vera extracts.
  • Quantity: 55 sheets

3.title: Hydra Water makeup remover wipes
3.description:
Dafi's Hydra water make-up remover wipes, with effective and useful ingredients, removes make-up, impurities and pollution from the entire face and gives your face a special vitality and freshness by soothing, hydrating, repairing and nourishing the skin.

  • Fast cleansing with maintaining the elasticity and transparency of the skin, without causing sensitivity and inflammation
  • Moisturizing and repairing skin tissues, controlling acne and preventing facial skin dryness.
  • Contains extracts of cucumber, chamomile, lemon, marigold, aloe vera and tea tree oil.
  • Suitable for all skin types
  • Quantity: 55 sheets
